channel.name: Component 1

com.mirth.connect.plugins.messagebuilder.name: Message Header - Date/Time of Message - Time of An Event (MSH.7.1) (out)
Message Header - Message Type - Trigger Event (MSH.9.2) (out) <-- row - column1 (in)
Message Header - Message Control ID - Value (MSH.10.1) (out) <-- row - column2 (in)
Patient identification - Patient Identifier List (PID.3) (out) <-- row - PID (in)
Patient identification - Patient Name - Family Name (PID.5.1) (out) <-- row - LASTNAME (in)
Patient identification - Patient Name - Given Name (PID.5.2) (out) <-- row - FIRSTNAME (in)
Patient identification - Date/Time of Birth - Time of An Event (PID.7.1) (out) <-- row - DOB (in)
Patient identification - Administrative Sex - Value (PID.8.1) (out) <-- row - SEX (in)

Patient identification - Phone Number - Business [0] - Email Address (PID.14.4) (out) <-- row - EMAIL (in)
Patient visit - Patient Class - Value (PV1.2.1) (out) <-- row - PTYPE (in)
Patient visit - Assigned Patient Location - Facility (HD) - PV1.3.4.1 (out) <-- row - FACILITY (in)

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: //Location validation could be added for multilocation facilities
